question: Which genes predict sensitivity to PI3Kbeta Inhibitor AZD8186 in Prostate Cancer?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('PI3Kbeta Inhibitor AZD8186')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('PI3Kbeta Inhibitor AZD8186'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('PI3Kbeta Inhibitor AZD8186')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Prostate')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: List genes associated with sensitivity to Fexagratinib in Lung Adenocarcinoma.
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Fexagratinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Fexagratinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Fexagratinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Lung Adenocarcinoma')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Bortezomib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Bortezomib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Multiple Myeloma')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Rucaparib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Prostate')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: Which genes predict sensitivity to Fisogatinib in Hepatocellular Carcinoma?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Fisogatinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Fisogatinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Fisogatinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Hepatocellular Carcinoma')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Panobinostat'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Panobinostat')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Neuroblastoma')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Pembrolizumab')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Pembrolizumab'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Pembrolizumab')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Colorectal')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Olaparib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Olaparib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Olaparib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Breast Carcinoma')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: What genes are sensitivity biomarkers for Sotorasib in Cancer?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)

)

question: List genes associated with sensitivity to Akt Inhibitor MK2206 in Clear Cell Renal Cell Carcinoma.
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Akt Inhibitor MK2206')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Akt Inhibitor MK2206'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Akt Inhibitor MK2206')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Clear Cell Renal Cell Carcinoma')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: Which genes predict sensitivity to Binimetinib in Cancer?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Binimetinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Binimetinib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Binimetinib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Cancer')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,

WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL

WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Talazoparib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Talazoparib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Acral Lentiginous Melanoma')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: Which genes predict sensitivity to Durvalumab in Lung Non-small Cell Carcinoma?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Durvalumab')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Durvalumab'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Durvalumab')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Lung Non-small Cell Carcinoma')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Palbociclib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Skin Melanoma')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN

  gene_symbol,

  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Pertuzumab')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Melanoma')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,

  disease_name,

AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Melanoma')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)

  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: Which genes predict sensitivity to Durvalumab in Triple-receptor Negative Breast Cancer?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Durvalumab')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Durvalumab'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Durvalumab')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Triple-receptor Negative Breast')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('JAK Inhibitor I'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('JAK Inhibitor I')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('B-lymphoblastic Leukemia/lymphoma')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Pictilisib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Pictilisib'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Pictilisib')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'sensitivity'
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('Head And Neck')
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'sensitivity' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100
